name: Affix API
long_description: Today, onboarding teams at HR/Payroll companies spend hours to weeks migrating customers' data from their former provider, using CSVsâ€” a slow, unreliable, and costly process. Affix API is an API for data migrations for HR/Payroll companies. With Affix API, HR/Payroll companies can migrate new customers' data from their former HR/Payroll system, in seconds.
one_liner: API for data migrations for HR/Payroll companies
